highlights: This release significantly advances the Carta editor with legacy editor feature parity and new functionality, improves shortcuts and navigation, and delivers broad UI and polish improvements across the app.

features: Added a "What’s New" dialog to surface key changes in each release
Introduced the experimental Carta editor engine (available under Feature Flags)
Added a rich table editor, support for horizontal rules, blockquotes, highlighting, underlining, and more,
Reimplemented spellcheck using a lightweight dictionary search and added personal dictionary and the ability to ignore suggestions
Expanded shortcut support with new cycling actions and improved command palette organization
Added a boot animation during application startup
Added a shortcut for toggling developer tools
improvements: Removed LLaMa spellcheck to reduce app size and complexity
Fixed a bug where undoing after opening a note would clear the note
The sidebar now displays a loading state while notes are being fetched
Prevented note titles from fading when the full title fits
Added overflow detection for long note titles in the Sidebar
Renamed "Experimental" settings to "Feature Flags" and added clearer descriptions
Added an "Update Plume" section to General settings
Refreshed the changelog UI with improved layout and styling
Updated the What’s New dialog to include the app version and new features
Updated changelog version messaging for clarity
Replaced hover animations with instant feedback
Removed button transitions for a snappier UI
Unified focus outlines across UI primitives
Prevented mount animations on toggles
Dialogs now close when their open shortcut is pressed again
Standardized dialog layouts and improved close button/icon sizing
Smoothed dialog open and close animations
Restricted dialog overflow scrolling to the vertical axis only
Initialized all dialogs as closed by default
Stopped the app from completely overlapping onboarding during transitions
Used the proper macOS traffic-light positioning API
other: Theme support has been removed, but it will be reintroduced in a future release

highlights: Introduces a new Keyboard Shortcut editor and an overall better user experience.

features: The Changelog dialog now fetches the latest release notes from a remote source
The Editor status bar now displays the word and character count for the current text selection
Added a new Shortcuts dialog to view and manage keyboard shortcuts
improvements: Onboarding flow now restricts the window size for better user experience
Improved the logic for grouping notes in the sidebar by date
Numerous minor UI adjustments, including standardizing icon sizing and polishing transition effects in the Sidebar and Tabs
Tabs now have a distinct visual style when being reordered
The type scale has been improved for better readability
Made the editor top bar act as a drag region to move the window
Added regex replace placeholders ($1, $2, etc.) to the search and replace modal
The default window size was increased from 900x800 to 1300x900
Made it possible to restart the onboarding flow from the menu bar or by keyboard shortcut
developer: The old "markdownHider" plugin has been deprecated and replaced with a new "richView" plugin
Significant refactoring to reorganize core logic, including moving Trove and editor plugin files into new, dedicated directories

highlights: Introduces a welcome experience for new users, makes trove discovery significantly faster, and improves the fullscreen experience.

features: New onboarding flow that guides new users through creating their first trove
Added "Open existing as trove" option to convert folders containing markdown files into troves
Added "Default trove" setting to change the behavior of trove selection on startup
improvements: Much faster trove discovery on app startup
Updating a note's title no longer changes the content of the note
Better error handling when working with files and folders
Default window size increased for a more comfortable experience
Fixed a bug where syntax outside of fenced code blocks was not properly highlighted
Added a shortcut to change troves (⌥⌘O)
Fixed a bug where line numbers were incorrectly positioned when a line started with # and then immediately text without whitespace
Tab bar now animates smoothly in and out with height transitions
Transparency effects automatically disabled in fullscreen mode
App elements like the tab bar, sidebar, and editor now respect fullscreen mode
Fixed a bug where pressing Cmd+S would clear the current note
developer: Removed theme editor and live preview

highlights: Introduces Troves, a portable folder-based system for organizing notes with attachments and metadata, alongside a redesigned editor navigation bar and a new reading view and source mode.

features: Notes are now stored in folders that contain .md files you can access directly
Trove browser to create new note collections or open existing folders
Reading view hides markdown syntax for easier reading
Source mode shows all markdown syntax when editing
Files changed outside the app sync automatically with the editor
Better validation when renaming notes to prevent duplicates and invalid characters
Refresh from file command (Cmd/Ctrl+R) to reload notes from disk
improvements: Cleaner editor header with better navigation controls
Search now cleans markdown formatting for better matching
Auto-save happens faster and more reliably
Window transparency can be adjusted in settings
The Developer and Examples menubar tabs have been removed
Changed duplicate note shortcut to Cmd+Shift+D to avoid conflicts
Fixed selection highlighting for trailing whitespace
Fixed markdown syntax being shown in hybrid mode even if the editor wasn't focused
Fixed a crash that occurs when no notes are open
Better handling of Enter and Backspace in markdown lists (experimental)
Setting to enable indent guides (experimental)
other: Notes from previous versions are not compatible and need to be recreated
Removed some menu items and simplified navigation

highlights: Adds tasks lists, bullet lists, improved text and caret styling, and syntax highlighting in code fences. Sidebar search now uses fuzzy finding, with smoother interactions and better scaling support.

features: Bullet lists and task lists have updated visuals, with full task list support
Editor top navigation includes reading/editing toggle, recent tab navigation, and additional controls
Source mode can be enabled from settings or the navigation dropdown to view raw Markdown
Links are highlighted; autolinks and masked links open with Cmd/Ctrl + click
New font set added
Settings and new note button are located at the bottom of the sidebar
Code fences support syntax highlighting when a language specifier is present
improvements: Editor border is removed when both sidebar and tab bar are hidden
Sidebar note search now uses fuzzy finding
Closing the theme modal reopens the settings modal
Sidebar notes have a press animation
Settings sidebar buttons shrink on press
Zoom scaling improved, with horizontal scrolling when needed
Sidebar animates when toggled
Text selection and caret have been restyled
Find and replace modal now floats
New notes no longer include placeholder content
Sidebar notes feature a context menu instead of a dropdown
Base text size in the editor increased for improved legibility
Sidebar and tab bar toggling works correctly
Autoclosing behaves correctly when pairs are deleted and retyped
Ghost selection no longer appears on window blur
Traffic lights retain their position after window resize
Themes are properly applied on app launch
Navigation no longer retraces unexpectedly

highlights: This update focuses on the appearance and visuals of Plume, introducing a new theme editor, revamped color system, enhanced find & replace functionality, and improved editor capabilities.

features: Added new theme editor to preview themes with live preview
Clickable preview indicator that opens theme editor directly
Remapped entire app to new color system with more granular tokens
Made the tab bar togglable (⌥⌘T)
Completely redesigned the find and replace UI
Added preserve case option in find & replace
Independent folding controls for headings and indented content
Dynamic reconfiguration of editor extensions without restart
improvements: Polished changelog UI with better spacing and typography
Enhanced find & replace with better keyboard shortcuts and navigation
Improved theme preview state management and cleanup
Better handling of editor fold state changes
Reimplement copying, cutting, and pasting (removed in 1.0.0-beta.3)
Fix positioning of heading folds when no whitespace or text followed the heading mark
Handle the new tab button properly again when the tab bar overflows
Fix markdown header hiding for empty headers

highlights: This update brings new editor settings, improved drag behavior, and enhanced sidebar interactions for a better writing experience.

features: Added show folds in gutter setting
Added indent guides setting
Added spell check setting
Added confirm file deletion setting
improvements: Changed draggable region from top 12px of window to empty space in sidebar and tab bar
Made sidebar items shrink on press to align behavior with tab bar
Fixed ampersands (&) not showing in the menubar (File > Recent Notes)
Fixed the muted text color in the catppuccin theme
Fixed padding on sidebar drop menu trigger
Removed the ability to comment out lines
